snippet.title: Haiti searches for clean water solutions
snippet.description:
* In January 2010 a seven-point magnitude earthquake rocked Haiti, killing more than 250,000 people and damaging its infrastructure, including some water systems.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/23/world/americas/haitis-deadly-cholera-strike-again/index.html

snippet.title: 7.5-magnitude quake strikes off Papua New Guinea
snippet.description:
* An earthquake struck late Saturday off Papua New Guinea's eastern coast with a preliminary magnitude of 7.5, the U.S. Geological Survey said.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/19/world/asia/papua-new-guinea-quake/index.html

snippet.title: Magnitude-7.2 earthquake strikes southern Mexico
snippet.description:
* It met the definition of a major one, but the magnitude-7.2 earthquake that struck Friday in southern Mexico's Guerrero state didn't land the kind of punch that it might have.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/world/americas/mexico-earthquake/index.html

snippet.title: Earthquake reported near Solomon Islands
snippet.description:
* A tsunami warning was canceled following a 7.6-magnitude earthquake that struck Sunday morning near the Solomon Islands, officials said.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/12/world/asia/pacific-earthquake/index.html

snippet.title: Strong earthquake rattles Nicaragua
snippet.description:
* A 6.1-magnitude earthquake struck Nicaragua on Thursday, the U.S. Geological Survey reported.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/10/world/americas/nicaragua-earthquake/index.html

snippet.title: Chile's big quake is not California's fault, scientists say
snippet.description:
* The powerful 8.2-magnitude earthquake that struck northern Chile on Tuesday night came after a series of quakes had shaken the Los Angeles area in recent weeks.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/02/us/chile-california-quakes/index.html
